categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Arjur was a Jedi Master of the Jedi Order who spent decades living with members of the Kubaz species in their hive in an effort to learn more about their culture through immersion in it. By the time the Jedi finally returned from the Kubaz, Arjur had developed a craving for dried moon moths.

Arjur was first mentioned in the "Jedi Cultural Immersion" Codex entry in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare in 2011; the entry did not specify Arjur's species, gender, or when Arjur spent time with the Kubaz.
